metadataAttributes.Title: Modern and Contemporary Art and Design Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Explore Art and Ideas of Our Time. Develop a deeper understanding of artists’ and designers’ processes, and gain confidence in looking at and talking about art.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Photography, Design, Art, History, Museums, Creativity, Art History, Art Direction,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Lisa Mazzola ,Sarah Meister ,Lucy Gallun ,Sophie Cavoulacos ,Sean Anderson ,Arièle Dionne-Krosnick ,Erica Papernik-Shimizu ,Christian Rattemeyer ,Paola Antonelli ,Michelle Millar Fisher ,Stephanie Kramer ,Anna Burckhardt ,
